title: COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping: Hotel Quality, Set of 2 - Down Alternative Microfiber Filled for Back, Stomach, Side Sleepers, Breathable, and Skin-Friendly
descriptions:
Sleep cooler, deeper, and more comfortably with the COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows, a hotel-quality set of 2 designed for every kind of sleeper. Crafted with plush down-alternative microfiber and supportive hollow fiber fill, these pillows deliver cloud-like softness with balanced support for your head, neck, and shoulders—perfect for back, stomach, and side sleepers.

Why you’ll love them:
- Cooling and breathable: Airy, skin-friendly polyester-blend cover and ventilated fill help wick away heat for a fresh, cool night’s sleep.
- Plush comfort with support: The lofty hollow fiber fill cushions pressure points while retaining its shape for consistent neck support.
- No-shift construction: Stays fluffy and evenly filled—no clumping, no flattening, just reliable comfort night after night.
- Easy care, easy life: Machine washable at 30°C and tumble-dry low to keep them fresh, fluffy, and like new.
- Hygienic and convenient: Arrive vacuum-packed—simply allow 24 hours to fully expand before use.

Upgrade your bedding with the soft, breathable, and supportive comfort of COZSINOOR. Wake up cool, rested, and ready for the day, every day. Set of 2 Queen pillows included.
